text:
How to Turn Water into Ice without a Freezer.
See water freeze before your eyes with the

magic of physics. You will need Cup Water
Bell jar Vacuum pump and acetone (optional).

Step 1. Fill the cup with water. Use equal
parts acetone and water to speed the process.

Step 2. Place the cup inside the bell jar.
Step 3. Connect the bell jar to the vacuum

pump and turn it on. Step 4. Watch the water
begin to bubble. Step 5. Watch the water turn

into ice as the warmer molecules escape into
the vacuum and the cooler molecules clump

together to form ice in the cup. Did you know
The lower the air pressure, the lower the

boiling point of water. If the pressure is
low enough, water will boil at room temperature.
